    • 方法详细资料

      • Write

        public static void Write​(java.lang.String UserName,
                         int Score)
        参数:
        UserName -
        Score - This method is to write a line including username and his score with the style(xxx/20) to ScoreList.txt in data directory

      • Read

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> Read()
                                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        返回:
        Map
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - This method is to read a every line in ScoreList.txt in data directory and store to a map with key(username) and value(score)

      • Read_rank

        public static java.lang.StringBuffer Read_rank​(int level)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        参数:
        level -
        返回:
        StringBuffer with all info in the file
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - This method is to read info in specific level list text file in data like HighScoreList_level1.txt in these file the data is witten by the syntax (UserName/Time/Moves)

      • Write_rank

        public static void Write_rank​(int level,
                              java.lang.String[] new_user_info)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        参数:
        level -
        new_user_info -
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - This method is to write the username whose grade is in top10 by read all the info in existed file and clear it then judge which rank the new user is finally write all to the file

      • Write_array

        public static void Write_array​(int level,
                               java.util.ArrayList<ScoreRecord.UserInfo> m_userinfo)
        参数:
        level -
        m_userinfo - This method is to write a list of UserInfo to the file
